citations.narrative:
The Record of Acquisition and Dogs and on Hand (APHIS form 7005) had not been update to include a newly acquired 10
week old puppy. The licensee had acquired a puppy two weeks ago in order to expand the breeding stock, however none
of the required information had been documented. Records must be maintained for all dogs in the kennel and must be
updated with the required information to accurately reflect the current inventory. The licensee must correct this issue by
updating and maintaining a current APHIS 7005 form.
********Correct by April 1, 2025

A Contingency Plan had been documented for the facility, however annual reviews are not being conducted as required.
The facility must review the plan on an annual basis, and the date of review and plan revisions, if any, must be
documented. The licensee must correct this issue.
*****Correct by April 1, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The Record of Acquisition and Dogs and on Hand (APHIS form 7005) had not been update to include a newly acquired 10 
week old puppy. The licensee had acquired a puppy two weeks ago in order to expand the breeding stock, however none 
of the required information had been documented. Records must be maintained for all dogs in the kennel and must be 
updated with the required information to accurately reflect the current inventory. The licensee must correct this issue by 
updating and maintaining a current APHIS 7005 form.  
********Correct by April 1, 2025 
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
A Contingency Plan had been documented for the facility, however annual reviews are not being conducted as required. 
The facility must review the plan on an annual basis, and the date of review and plan revisions, if any, must be 
documented. The licensee must correct this issue.  
*****Correct by April 1, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
